content:
Sure, here are five different scenarios that a guest commonly encounters at a restaurant that involve some interaction with the server, listed as strings and stored in a Python list:
```python
restaurant_scenarios = [
    "Asking for menu recommendations",
    "Requesting dietary accommodations or substitutions",
    "Inquiring about ingredients or food preparation",
    "Asking for refills or additional items",
    "Addressing issues with the meal or service"
]
```
